item.title: Face Explore
item.description: Where did it all begin? MIT Ring Delivery How? My first approach was to rank the images in the database based on the distance of the vector embeddings of faces in the database and the sample. The result was terrible! Some random math here: $$ \int_0^\infty e^{-x^2} dx = \frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2} $$

item.title: Human foundation model
item.description: Inpisred from a conversation with Arash Bidgoli. We are living in a world that data is flowing everywhere. Perhaps we could understand a person very well by just observing all their interactions with others. I always had this dream of cloning myself by just feeding all my diaries into a model. Perhaps just having the diaries is not enough but what if we store literally everything. Perhaps smart glasses might be the first step in achieving this.

item.title: Neural Implant
item.description: Neural Implant? Here we talk about matrix. Give them a vision. subtitle1 Here we talk about technical details. subtitle2
